text: [Music]
today there are billions of devices
sensors and controllers in homes and in
factories
on farms in hospitals and in cars that
can be connected together to create
incredible applications
be these simple systems that turn on a
light bulb or controllers that can
adjust the output of a wind turbine
a flow monitor that can make adjustments
on the fly in a manufacturing line
or a smart car that can report issues
before they happen
how do we communicate with these devices
how do we link them together and create
smart systems
how do we analyze the data from these
devices that is the focus of our class
iot on aws in this class
we will build an iot solution on aws
you will have the opportunity to create
an iot application
that uses several iot services you will
use
aws iot software development kit to
programmatically communicate
with and control remote devices we will
look at a distributed architecture
where we will tie in devices at the edge
using aws
iot green grass and we will use aws
analytics to collect data from our
devices
to make intelligent decisions about how
to manage these devices
throughout the class there'll be
hands-on exercises that you can complete
in your own aws account
now you won't need any special hardware
for this class we'll take advantage of
the aws cloud
resources to simulate devices still
the lessons learned should directly
transfer actual iot devices
please join us for this exciting
four-week journey
learning about aws iot
[Music]
